network.note: Available on Visa and RuPay networks. Mastercard issuance discontinued per RBI guidelines. RuPay variant supports UPI linking.

renewalWaiver.waiverText: Spend ₹50,000 or more in a year before your Credit Card renewal date and get your renewal fee waived off

latePayment.calculation: Tiered based on outstanding balance (effective August 1, 2024)

cashProcessingFee.note: For card payments at HDFC Bank branches or ATMs. Waived if late payment charges applied in current statement.

railwayTicketPurchaseFee.note: 1% of transaction amount + GST, reversed after transaction

rentPaymentFee.note: Applicable when using third-party apps like CRED, PayTM, Cheq, MobiKwik, Freecharge. Effective August 1, 2024.

utilityPaymentFee.note: 1% fee on utility payments exceeding ₹50,000 per transaction. Insurance payments exempt.

fuelTransactionFee.note: 1% fee on fuel transactions exceeding ₹15,000 per transaction

creditLimit.factors: Based on income, credit score, credit history, and existing relationship with HDFC Bank

cashAdvanceAPR.note: 3.75% per month (45% per annum) for non-premium cards

gracePeriod.note: Up to 50 days from the date of purchase (subject to submission of charge by merchant)

minPayment.calculation: 5% of total outstanding or ₹200, whichever is higher

cashAdvance.note: 2.5% of withdrawn amount or ₹500, whichever is higher. Interest charged from day of withdrawal.

baseRate.note: Base rate of 2 CashPoints per ₹150 = 0.33% reward rate (at ₹0.25 per point)

rewards.earningText: Earn 2 CashPoints for every ₹150 spent on regular purchases. Earn 10X CashPoints (20 per ₹150) on Amazon, BigBasket, Flipkart, Reliance Smart SuperStore & Swiggy.

categories: Payment of card fees and charges
exclusions.note: MCC codes defined by card networks (Visa, Mastercard, RuPay). Transactions at these MCCs do not earn CashPoints.

caps.note: Maximum 15,000 CashPoints can be earned per statement cycle. 10X and 5X categories capped at 2,500 CashPoints/month each. Grocery transactions capped at 1,000 CashPoints/month. UPI transactions capped at 500 CashPoints/month.

expiry.condition: From date of earning. If card not used for 365+ days, all CashPoints are nullified.

welcome.validity: On payment of joining membership fee
welcome.description: Get 500 CashPoints as welcome benefit on payment of joining membership fee

renewal.condition: On payment of renewal membership fee

tenXPartners.note: 10X CashPoints (20 CashPoints per ₹150) = 3.33% effective reward rate. Applicable on App, Website, and Physical stores.

emi.note: 5X CashPoints on Merchant/EasyEMI transactions. Only EMI principal amount eligible. SmartEMI/Dial An EMI not included. Points reversed if EMI preclosed.

online.note: Base rate applies to online transactions except excluded categories

fuel.note: No rewards on fuel transactions. 1% surcharge waiver available.

groceries.note: Base rate capped at 1,000 CashPoints per month on grocery transactions. BigBasket covered under 10X partners.

utilities.note: Base rate applies. 1% fee applies on transactions > ₹50,000.

international.note: Base rate applies. 3.5% forex markup charged.

insurance.note: CashPoints on insurance transactions capped at 2,000 per month (effective October 1, 2025)

rent.note: No rewards on rent payments. 1% fee (capped at ₹3,000) applies when using third-party apps.

walletLoads.note: No rewards on wallet loads, prepaid card loads, or voucher purchases

upi.note: RuPay variant only. 2 CashPoints per ₹200 spent via UPI, capped at 500 points/month.

bankPortal.name: SmartBuy
bankPortal.note: SmartBuy/PayZapp transactions earn base rate of 2 CashPoints per ₹150. Other SmartBuy offers apply as per T&C.

partnerMerchants.note: 10X partners already listed in categories. No additional partner accelerators.

spendUnlock.note: No spend-based multiplier unlocks for this card

monthlyRedemptionLimit.note: W.e.f. February 1, 2026, reward points can be redeemed up to a maximum of 5 times a month

pointsPlusPay.note: Up to 70% of product/voucher value can be redeemed through CashPoints on select products/vouchers

options.note: 1 CashPoint = ₹0.25. Minimum 500 CashPoints (₹125) required. Maximum 50,000 CashPoints per month. Via NetBanking, PhoneBanking, or physical form.
Up to 50% of booking value can be redeemed through CashPoints. Maximum 50,000 CashPoints per calendar month.
Redeem against products from rewards catalog
Up to 70% of voucher value redeemable via CashPoints on select vouchers
Airmiles conversion available but transfer ratios not specified for this card tier

transferPartners.note: Transfer partners not available for entry-level MoneyBack+ card. Available on premium cards like Infinia, Diners Black.

eligibleCards: All HDFC credit cards of same customer
pooling.note: Pool CashPoints across your HDFC cards via NetBanking

specialLogic.postingTiming: CashPoints earned in a calendar month are posted in the 1st week of the subsequent calendar month
specialLogic.transactionEligibility: Only settled transactions within the calendar month are considered for CashPoints posting

domestic.note: No domestic lounge access - this is an entry-level card

international.note: No international lounge access - this is an entry-level card

milestones.conditions: Earn a gift voucher worth ₹500 every calendar quarter on spends of ₹50,000 or above. Maximum ₹2,000 worth of vouchers in a year (4 quarters).

golf.note: No golf benefits - this is an entry-level card

movies.note: No movie benefits on this card

programs.name: Swiggy Dineout
programs.note: Up to 20% off at 2000+ premium restaurants in select cities. ₹200 discount on MOV ₹2,000 when paying via Swiggy Dineout.

fuel.note: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions between ₹400 and ₹5,000. Maximum waiver ₹250 per statement cycle. Surcharge rate varies by fuel station and acquiring bank. GST not waived.

dynamicCurrencyConversion.recommendation: Always decline DCC and pay in local currency to avoid higher markup

forex.note: Forex markup applies to all non-INR transactions including online purchases from foreign merchants

concierge.note: No concierge service - this is an entry-level card

roadsideAssistance.note: No roadside assistance - this is an entry-level card

noCostEMI.note: No-cost EMI available on select merchants and products

conversionFee.note: Processing fee up to ₹199 + GST for EasyEMI at online/offline stores

emi.note: Convert big-ticket purchases to EMI post-purchase. 5X CashPoints on Merchant/EasyEMI. SmartEMI not eligible for 5X.

processingFee.note: 1% of transfer amount or ₹250, whichever is higher

balanceTransfer.note: Balance transfer facility available from other bank credit cards

fraudLiability.note: Zero lost card liability on fraudulent transactions if reported immediately to HDFC Bank's 24-hour Call Centre (1800 1600 / 1800 2600 or 022-61606160 for overseas)

insurance.note: This is an entry-level card with minimal insurance benefits. Only zero lost card liability is included.

contactless.note: Contactless payments enabled. PIN required for transactions ≥₹5,000.

upi.note: UPI linking available for RuPay variant only. Link via PayZapp or other UPI apps.

upiLinking.note: Only P2M transactions eligible. RuPay variant required.

autopay.note: SmartPay available for automated bill payments

upgradesTo.note: Upgrade to Millennia for better cashback rates
Upgrade to Regalia for travel benefits and lounge access

upgradePathway.note: Upgrade eligibility based on spend history, credit score, and relationship with HDFC Bank

meta.bestFor: Beginners and budget-conscious spenders who frequently shop on Amazon, Flipkart, Swiggy, BigBasket, and Reliance Smart SuperStore. Annual spending of ₹50,000-₹2,00,000.
meta.notRecommendedFor: Travelers seeking lounge access, premium insurance, or concierge services. High spenders who would benefit more from premium cards. Those who primarily use UPI or cash.

rating.note: Excellent value for fee. Strong rewards on select merchants but limited benefits.

meta.verdict: The HDFC MoneyBack+ is an excellent entry-level credit card for those who frequently shop on Amazon, Flipkart, Swiggy, BigBasket, and Reliance Smart SuperStore. The 10X CashPoints (3.33% effective rate) on these partners is competitive for this price point. However, the card lacks travel benefits, lounge access, and comprehensive insurance. Best suited for beginners building credit history or those maximizing rewards on specific partner merchants.
pros: Low annual fee of ₹500 with easy spend-based waiver (₹50K/year)
10X CashPoints (3.33% effective rate) on popular merchants like Amazon, Flipkart, Swiggy
RuPay variant supports UPI with rewards
cons: No travel insurance or purchase protection
No rewards on fuel, rent, government transactions
1% fee on rent payments via third-party apps

alternatives.reason: Better cashback rates (1:1) but double the annual fee (₹1,000)
Better for UPI-heavy users with category-based cashback
5% unlimited cashback on online spends but requires higher income
Higher cashback on bill payments and partner merchants

dataSource: HDFC Bank MITC document (Version dated November 2025)
HDFC Bank Terms & Conditions effective August 2024

changelog.change: 1% fee introduced on rent payments via third-party apps (CRED, PayTM, etc.), capped at ₹3,000
Late payment fee structure revised - tiered from ₹100 to ₹1,300 based on outstanding
Wallet loading and Easy EMI transactions no longer earn Reward Points
Insurance transactions CashPoints capped at 2,000 per month
Online skill-based gaming transactions no longer earn CashPoints
Reward points redemption limited to maximum 5 times per month
Rent payments and government-related transactions excluded from rewards. Grocery transactions capped at 1,000 CashPoints/month.
Flight & hotel redemption via SmartBuy capped at 50,000 CashPoints per calendar month
Cashback redemption capped at 50,000 CashPoints per calendar month
